root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 10-4-1, translated into en
root.data: The labor force share of the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is the total remuneration of employees, measured as a percentage of GDP, which is a measure of total production. It provides information on the relative share of production that is paid as compensation to employees, compared to the share paid to capital in the production process for a given reference period.
